title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
General Considerations

For Task A, the response must correctly identify the percentage of the budget that was mandatory spending in 1968.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe a change over time in the pie charts.
descriptions: The responses accomplish none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the Tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the Tasks set by the question.
